Text: Twin Tower Sanctuary:  The north side of the church is flanked by the two hexagonal towers that give the church its name.
Triplets:<Twin Tower Sanctuary
4:
--------------------
Text: Twin Tower Sanctuary:  The interior of the church has a Sullivanesque patterned tin ceiling; according to Louis Sullivan scholar Tim Samuelson, it is the best-preserved example of a Sullivanesque tin ceiling in the country.
Triplets:<Twin Tower Sanctuary
